email_body: Team, Attached is the newest EBS orgchart, updated 2 days ago. They have made some interesting changes. Also, you can click on the URL below to go to the EBS intranet site, where you will find all sorts of information related to EBS, its market and competition, etc. As a "high-tech" company, they actually do keep this updated very frequently, unlike some of the other Enron internal web sites. (you will find Norm Levine's market/comp info here, as well) http://websource.enron.net/ Jeff
